about.vision: To achieve excellence in the field of Information Technology by developing Competent Engineers to cater the need of IT industry and Society.
mission: Achieve excellence in teaching learning process by imparting quality and value based education
Groom competent IT professionals by keeping pace with changing technology to address needs of industry and society

values.title: Excellence
values.description: Commitment to delivering highest quality education and fostering innovation in every endeavor

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Encouraging creative thinking and cutting-edge solutions to real-world problems

values.title: Integrity
values.description: Maintaining ethical standards and professional responsibility in all academic and professional pursuits

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: Fostering teamwork and collective growth through inclusive and supportive environment

history.description: Information Technology Department was established with the vision to prepare competent IT professionals. Over the years, it has become a premier destination for quality IT education in the region.

features.title: State-of-the-Art Infrastructure
features.description: Modern labs equipped with latest technology and computing resources

features.title: Experienced Faculty
features.description: Dedicated teachers with industry experience and academic excellence

features.title: Industry Collaborations
features.description: Strong partnerships with leading IT companies for internships and placements

features.title: Research Focus
features.description: Active research centers in AI, Data Science, and Cloud Computing

features.title: Skill Development
features.description: Regular workshops and training on emerging technologies

features.title: Entrepreneurship Support
features.description: Incubation cell supporting student-led startups and innovations
